meta.description: Free online PDF stamp, merge, split, and compress tool without the need for registration.
meta.ogTitle: Free PDF Stamping & Splitting - No Registration, Forever Free
meta.ogDescription: An efficient PDF processing and e-stamping solution

stamp.title: Select Stamp Pages
stamp.quickSelectHelper: Hint: Enter page ranges (e.g., 1-5) or individual pages (e.g., 1,3,8) separated by commas
stamp.randomAngleSwitch: Use random angle for each stamp
stamp.transparentPngHint: Supports PNG with transparency, or click 'Make Transparent Stamp' to process regular images
stamp.positionHint: Adjust the stamp angle after selecting a page
stamp.verticalPositionHint: Value between 0-297 indicating distance from the top
stamp.straddleDistribution: The stamp will be evenly distributed on the right side of all pages
stamp.dragImageHint: Drag and drop an image here, or click the button to select
stamp.previewHint: The processed preview will be displayed here
stamp.cropHint: Tip: Crop the stamp to its edges without leaving white margins for best results

split.customHelper: Supports range (1-5), single pages (2,5,8) or mixed mode
split.enterValidPageRange: Please enter a valid page range
split.pageRangeMustBeBetween: Page range must be between 1 and {{totalPages}}, with start page not greater than end page
split.pageMustBeBetween: Page numbers must be between 1 and {{totalPages}}, with start page not greater than end page
split.pageNumberMustBeBetween: Page number must be between 1 and {{totalPages}}

compress.title: File Preview
compress.alreadyOptimal: The file is already at optimal size ({{fileSize}}), no further compression is needed.
compress.compressSuccess: Compression complete! File size reduced from {{originalSize}} to {{compressedSize}}, with a compression ratio of {{ratio}}%

merge.dropToAdd: Release mouse to add PDF files
merge.atLeastTwoFiles: At least two PDF files are required

home.privacyHint: All PDF files are processed locally on your device, no data is uploaded to any server

stamp.title: PDF Stamp
stamp.description: Add Electronic Stamps and Page Stamps to PDF

merge.title: PDF Merge
merge.description: Merge multiple PDF files into one

split.title: PDF Split
split.description: Split a PDF file into individual pages

compress.title: PDF Compress
compress.description: Compress a PDF file in the browser to reduce file size

extract.title: PDF Extract Images
extract.description: Extract images from a PDF file

sign.addSignatureTip: After setting the signature, click on the PDF page in the preview area to add it
sign.pageDescription: Add electronic signatures to PDF files with support for multiple signatures and custom positioning
sign.imageSupport: Supports PNG, JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, etc.

errors.invalidFile: Please select a valid PDF file
errors.noImages: No images found in the PDF
errors.partialExtraction: Partial extraction successful, available images extracted

device.desktopRecommended: Recommended to access on a desktop device
device.mobileNotSupported: {{toolName}} performs poorly on mobile devices, recommend using a desktop device for the best experience.
device.shareText: Please access this link on a desktop device for the best experience
device.simpleMobileNotSupported: This feature is not suitable for use on mobile devices, please copy the link and open it on a desktop device
device.desktopOnly: Please access on a desktop device
